selections.name: Bolt's Treasure
selections.reason: Significant class drop from Allowance/MSW company at Thistledown. Speed figures (93) fit well here, and the barn hits at 21%.

selections.name: Personal Jet
selections.reason: Consistent speed figures (98) and retains top jockey Cristian Torres. Logical contender.

selections.name: Good News Rocket
selections.reason: Asmussen trainee dropping to maiden claiming $12.5k. Speed 99 is competitive.

selections.name: Joewilly
selections.reason: Consistent runner with speed figures in the mid-90s. Should be part of the pace.

danger_horse.name: Joewilly
danger_horse.reason: Has the early speed to steal it if the pace collapses or he gets loose.

selections.name: Brilliant Man
selections.reason: Massive class drop from $30k-$50k levels. Speed figure of 105 towers over this field. Looks like a standout.

selections.name: Phenomenal Dream
selections.reason: Recent winner at this level. Speed 98 is solid for this group.

selections.name: Missing Rocks
selections.reason: Asmussen barn. Speed 94. Rail draw helps save ground.

selections.name: Promissione
selections.reason: Has back class and a 101 speed figure on the resume. Dangerous if he wakes up.

danger_horse.name: Promissione
danger_horse.reason: Capable of a big number (101) which would challenge the favorite.

selections.name: Big Red Machine
selections.reason: Impressive maiden breaker with a 101 speed figure. Amoss/Bejarano combo is lethal.

selections.name: She's So Coal
selections.reason: Won a $100k MSW last out. Fits the starter conditions perfectly. Speed 95.

selections.name: Amazing Amanda
selections.reason: Casse/Torres team. Speed 99. Consistent form.

selections.name: Tiz In Sight
selections.reason: Speed 101. Hartman barn is dangerous with sprinters.

danger_horse.name: Tiz In Sight
danger_horse.reason: High speed figure potential and good connections.

selections.name: Clocker Special
selections.reason: Top speed figure of 108. Won MSW at Ellis Park. Torres rides.

selections.name: Our Magical Moon
selections.reason: Casse/Torres. Speed 104. Won MSW at Oaklawn recently.

selections.name: Fifty Four Yarder
selections.reason: Speed 102. Saez aboard. Won debut at Oaklawn.

selections.name: Time For Music
selections.reason: Asmussen entry. Speed 98. Consistent.

danger_horse.name: Fifty Four Yarder
danger_horse.reason: Lightly raced with upside and Luis Saez.

selections.name: Promises To Dance
selections.reason: Maker/Santana. Drops from tougher company. Speed 103 fits well here.

selections.name: Bolt On The Rocks
selections.reason: Speed 103. Consistent runner at this level.

selections.name: Demi
selections.reason: Speed 104. Outside post is favorable for the trip.

selections.name: Windy Bay
selections.reason: Hartman/Arrieta. Speed 104. Always competitive.

danger_horse.name: Demi
danger_horse.reason: High speed figure and good outside draw to stalk.

selections.name: Rockin Robin
selections.reason: Casse/Torres. Speed 104. Consistent in MSW company.

selections.name: Dare Greatly
selections.reason: Miller/Vazquez. Speed 96. Rail draw.

selections.name: Take Charge Macy
selections.reason: Miller/Arrieta. Speed 102. Good recent form.

selections.name: Joke Maker
selections.reason: Brisset/Santana. Speed 96. Should be involved.

danger_horse.name: Take Charge Macy
danger_horse.reason: High speed figure (102) puts her right in the mix.

selections.name: Black Powder
selections.reason: Maker/Saez. Drops from AOC. Speed 104. Class of the field.

selections.name: Uncle Caesar
selections.reason: Brad Cox trainee with Torres. Speed 108 is top of the group.

selections.name: American Outlaw
selections.reason: Casse/Torres. Speed 106. Consistent.

selections.name: Hern
selections.reason: Speed 104. Consistent check earner.

danger_horse.name: Uncle Caesar
danger_horse.reason: Highest speed figure in the race (108) and dangerous connections.

selections.name: Roll On Big Joe
selections.reason: Speed 117 is elite. Should control the race with scratches reducing the field.

selections.name: Tejano Twist
selections.reason: Oaklawn specialist. Speed 113. Will be flying late.

selections.name: Wendelssohn
selections.reason: Speed 114. Fast enough to challenge.

selections.name: Bourbon Bash
selections.reason: Speed 109. Asmussen/Rosario.

danger_horse.name: Tejano Twist
danger_horse.reason: If the pace is hot, he wins. Always runs his race at OP.

selections.name: Untamed Moment
selections.reason: Speed 111 is the best in the field. Santana/Fawkes.

selections.name: Filly Crystal
selections.reason: Speed 106. Consistent. Torres rides.

selections.name: R Pretty Kitty
selections.reason: Speed 105. Good recent form.

selections.name: Delacina
selections.reason: Speed 102. Rail draw.

danger_horse.name: Filly Crystal
danger_horse.reason: Consistent speed figures and top jockey.

selections.name: Rockin The Lane
selections.reason: Hartman/Bacon. Speed 94 is the best established form.

selections.name: Miss Chocolatte
selections.reason: Torres rides. Speed 86. Should improve.

selections.name: Avery County
selections.reason: Morse/Bejarano. Speed 87. Competitive.

selections.name: Artemis Sparkles
selections.reason: First timer in a soft spot. Watch the board.

danger_horse.name: Avery County
